edge_1: In ancient Egypt, Princess Ahmanet made a deal with the deity Set to gain demonic powers through a ceremonial dagger. She murdered her family and attempted to set the deity free, but was caught and mummified alive by Egyptian priests for her crimes.
edge_2: Set takes over Nick's body after he stabs himself with the dagger, but Ahmanet tries to stop him. Set allows Nick to regain control when he remembers Jenny and Jekyll's words and uses Set's powers to extract Ahmanet's life force, killing her.

edge_1: In ancient Egypt, Princess Ahmanet made a deal with the deity Set to gain demonic powers through a ceremonial dagger. She murdered her family and attempted to set the deity free, but was caught and mummified alive by Egyptian priests for her crimes.
edge_2: Set possesses Nick after he stabs himself with the dagger, but Nick still struggles against Set's control. Set allows Nick to regain control when he remembers Jenny and Jekyll's words.

edge_1: Set takes over Nick's body after he stabs himself with the dagger, but Ahmanet tries to stop him. Set allows Nick to regain control when he remembers Jenny and Jekyll's words and uses Set's powers to extract Ahmanet's life force, killing her.
edge_2: Ahmanet tries to stop Set from taking over Nick's body after he stabs himself with the dagger, but Nick still resurrects her and then seals her back in her sarcophagus.
